title: 123. Help Wanted.  No Smokers Need Apply
description: In many states, it is perfectly legal to not hire someone who smokes. Should employers also be able to weed out junk-food lovers or motorcyclists -- or anyone who wants to have a baby?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
